Name: Boat model
Description: A model boat made from wood and gesso. The hull is painted yellow with a red line and strokes, the deck is white with red beams and mast. There are nine pairs of oarsmen and a steersman, the men are red in colour with black wigs and outline details. The eyes and tunics are white, the sail and garments are in linen. The mast lies flat to the deck, ready to be hoisted when travelling upstream.
